overview: Park Mun-Hee shows the Buddhist image of Ok-Kuem, one of her possession, to a Chinese archeologist but the image is exchanged with a bogus. Park Mun-Hee sets out to China with a detective Dong-Jin to search for the image, but it is after the archeologist is already murdered and the Buddhist image has disappeared. One day, an English man James steals the image from an antique shop, but he is too murdered afterward by a Japanese Kanemura. Dong-Jin and his companies succeed in taking the image after fighting with Jang-Bu and his gang. Mun-Hee donates the image to the Government so that they can keep it in the museum.
title: Brown-tailed Moth of Kuryong
